p: The silylation reaction was carried out as described by Lombardi et al. [ 29] with slight modifications. In brief, BSTFA and acetone were added to the sterol fraction and the reaction was carried out at 40 Â°C for 20 min to obtain trimethylsilyl ether (TMSE) derivatives. Sterols and alcohols, as TMSE derivatives, were analyzed using a DANI GC1000 DPC gas chromatograph equipped with a split-splitless injector and FID.
